price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߟߏߡߊߟߐ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߛߊ߲ߘߐߓߊ߯ ߞߙߎ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊߓߏ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߝߊ߲߭ ߓߍ߯ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُقۡذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā yassammaʿūna ilā al-mala-i al-aʿlā wayuq'dhafūna min kulli jānibin
